attributes.action: get rid of the UKARA laws affecting two tone airsoft weapons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like the prime minister to stop  the hindering a perfectly legitimate sport (airsofting). By making the players carry replica firearms that are painted bright colors such as lime green or florescent blue, removing the stealth element from the game. I suggest maybe making the person sign in to a website that will monitor the replicas usage for the first month.
